name: Carlota Merchant
details: Everything is beautiful here. I have made lots of friends. I love taekwondo and football.

name: Robert Rulle
details: Each day we did a different activity so I was never bored. I liked it so much, I am coming back in September to study full time in school

name: Carolina Doe
details: Sports Edge is the best camp I have ever been to. It’s like a second home to me. Some of my best memories are spending time with my roommates who will become lifelong friends.

name: Marteen Smith
details: I really enjoy class, and the games we play are fun and we learn a lot. I ate lime ice cream which was delicious!

name: Ema Johnson
details: Je m’appelle James et je viens du Canada. C’était mon premier camp d’été. J’ai adoré mes nouveaux amis et mon professeur de Français. Les activités de l’après-midi sont très variées et celles que j’ai adoré c’était de faire pendule au-dessus d’une rivière.
